TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArgumentAccessor extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A class containing a get/set delegate pair to access an argument in an activity instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .property instance class System.Func`2<class System.Activities.Activity, class System.Activities.Argument> Getter

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the method to retrieve an argument from an activity instance.
Docs.value: The method to retrieve an argument from an activity instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .property instance class System.Action`2<class System.Activities.Activity, class System.Activities.Argument> Setter

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the method to set an argument into an activity instance.
Docs.value: The method to set an argument into an activity instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Using a method assigned to this property is the preferred way to set the values of a model property. Using <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue%2A> will set the value in the editing context, which will not update the underlying value until the editing context completes.
